* '''Launchpad Entry''': UbuntuSpec:packageselection-edubuntu-n-schooltool

=== Summary ===

SchoolTool will be available in Natty. All dependencies are already in the archive, see <nowiki>[[Zope-Natty]]</nowiki>.

=== Status ===

Packages are being uploaded to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~schooltool-owners/+archive/ppa/+packages?field.name_filter=schooltool&field.status_filter=published&field.series_filter=natty|SchoolTool PPA]]</nowiki>, packaging branches are available at https://code.launchpad.net/~menesis/

See the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/natty/+queue?queue_state=0&queue_text=schooltool|NEW queue]]</nowiki> and the SchoolTool packaging <nowiki>[[http://ftp.schooltool.org/schooltool/trunk/overview.txt|overview]]</nowiki>, updated nightly, for complete status of all involved packages.
